chat.msg: hey, estas listo?
si yes
cool! so i'm at the starting point, i can see a twig to my left leading to a small island with a tiger on it
where to next?
left
here i am, standing on tiger island
where do we head from here, buddy?
straight to the parrot
alright, so now i'm on the big island with this noisy parrot on a tree
can you guide me where to go next?
around the parrot past the elephant and across to the water to the frog
passed the parrot and the elephant
made it across the water to where the frog is chilling. what's the next direction?
go past the frog a bit and turn around, go along the tree line and across the alligator to cross in front of the elephant again
done and done, past the frog and the crocodile, now right in front of the elephant again
cross the water to the giraffe, turn left and cross the water again to chat with the snake
alright, i've legged it to the giraffe, then took a left and crossed the water to the snake
what's next, pal?
go straight to the treasure!
perfect! took two steps east and now at the treasure
*finished*
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
yed
perfect! move to the left, go under that nearby wooden bench, and cross the path to the flower shop
Don't go too far, make a u-turn and head back towards the white dog. how are things with you?
things are well with me. y tu?
that's great to hear, i'm doing good too
now, go south over the branch and keep moving down until you see another white dog. how chilly is it out there?
i'm at the edge of the map and there isn't anther white dog. what do i do? it'
no worries
just follow the path over the picnic mat near the dog and head towards the bowl of berries. keep going west, cool?
it's rather warm here in the SE US. How about with you?
oh it's quite chilly up here in the north! enjoy the warmth friend! now, from the berries, find another branch and cross the river up north
are you finding this fun?
i'm almost back to where i started. I like playing the game.
glad you're enjoying this, buddy
now, avoid that green bush, circle it from the right and head to the flower shop. doing great so far!
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
hi there. i am ready to play. are you?
absolutely! i'm at the north end by the tent
where should i go first?
head south past the dog and find the path
ok, i see the dog by the fire
moving on, i can see the red mushroom and the blue car south of it. where to next?
go around the fire and go back to the pathway and follow it to the telescope
got it, just passed the blue car
now i'm at the telescope. what's next?
go around the telescope to the rock wall and go through straight to the cabin and you've reached your destination
done deal! i see the rocks and went through them
now i'm at the wooden house. *finished* thanks for guiding me!
hola, q tal? ready to go?
let's do this
awesome! let's start
head under the first palm tree and turn right, then do a sharp left before the third one and go straight south
what's next
now, spot a brown puppy
walk left of it, slight left, then swing right back south. clear?
ye[
cool
now look for two rocks, one big on your left, a small one on the right, walk between them towards the ocean. can you see it?
yes, i;m there
perfect! step into the water and say hi to a big red crab! after this, take a right turn and stroll by the big rock to your right, as you continue west
enjoying the water?
i'ts refreshing
faire enough! now, can you see a medium rock ahead? go along it and watch out for a shark
when you spot it, make a fast right turn!
done
good job, you're doing great! now head back to the land, and look for a tri-colored ball, cross between it and the rock you just passed, and go a bit north
see it?
yes, its cool
fantastic! next, turn slightly to your left and you will see a red tent and a speaker
walk right between them heading nw-ish. you got it?
yes
sweet! almost there! after you pass the speaker, curve around the tent till you see the sea again!
done
awesome! now head towards the shore but stop right before it, make a right and go under a red kayak
done
great! now, go 90 degree right, move along the kayak till you see a bush, the small green one! and there you are! you made it! how do you feel?

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.

general_survey.answer: i wish i had more opportunity to speak the other languages
